name: magnesium-protoporphyrin-IX 13-monomethyl ester,NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (hydroxylating)
definition: Magnesium protoporphyrin monomethyl ester + NADPH + H+ + Oxygen <=> 13(1)-Hydroxy-magnesium-protoporphyrin IX 13-monomethyl ester + NADP+ + H2O
comment: first step of three-step reaction (see R10068, R06265+R06266+R06267)
